pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easier Use of 'RcppSpdlog' Functions via Wrapper // Logging functions in 'RcppSpdlog' provide access to the logging functionality from the 'spdlog' 'C++' library. This package offers shorter convenience wrappers for the 'R' functions which match the 'C++' functions, namely via, say, 'spdl::debug()' at the debug level. The actual formatting is done by the 'fmt::format()' function from the 'fmtlib' library (that is also 'std::format()' in 'C++20' or later).
